page.title: 02THORPE GRANGE
page.content: {Thorpe Grange}has been a riding school for fourteen years and consists of one hundred and forty-five acres of land and thirty horses.The school has paddocks and cross-country courses for riding.Thorpe Grange also has an indoor arena which is used for shows and when the weather is unsuitable for outdoor activities. As well as being a riding school giving lessons the school runs courses involving pupils from the{Lincoln Technical College. These courses last for two years and train the students in horse management Thorpe Grange is owned and run by{Mrs Raymond Poskitt.}It has been a riding school for fourteen years. Besides horses they also have cattle and they grow crops on the extensive farmland.
